ChangeLog
=========


0.2.0 (2015-08-11)
------------------

* Allow initialization of board pieces.
* Implement brute-force solver.


0.1.1 (2015-08-08)
------------------

* Package re-release to fix bad version number.


0.1.0 (2015-08-08)
------------------

* First public release.
* Implements a CLI to inititalize the chessboard.


0.0.0 (2015-08-08)
------------------

* First commit.
